docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: day 5
docs.text:
def say_scores(score0, score1):
    """A commentary function that announces the score for each player."""
    print("Player 0 now has", score0, "and Player 1 now has", score1)
    return say_scores

def announce_lead_changes(last_leader=None):
    """Return a commentary function that announces lead changes.

    >>> f0 = announce_lead_changes()
    >>> f1 = f0(5, 0)
    Player 0 takes the lead by 5
    >>> f2 = f1(5, 12)
    Player 1 takes the lead by 7
    >>> f3 = f2(8, 12)
    >>> f4 = f3(8, 13)
    >>> f5 = f4(15, 13)
    Player 0 takes the lead by 2
    """
    def say(score0, score1):
        if score0 > score1:
            leader = 0
        elif score1 > score0:
            leader = 1
        else:
            leader = None
        if leader != None and leader != last_leader:
            print('Player', leader, 'takes the lead by', abs(score0 - score1))
        return announce_lead_changes(leader)
    return say

def both(f, g):
    """Return a commentary function that says what f says, then what g says.

    NOTE: the following game is not possible under the rules, it's just
    an example for the sake of the doctest

    >>> h0 = both(say_scores, announce_lead_changes())
    >>> h1 = h0(10, 0)
    Player 0 now has 10 and Player 1 now has 0
    Player 0 takes the lead by 10
    >>> h2 = h1(10, 8)
    Player 0 now has 10 and Player 1 now has 8
    >>> h3 = h2(10, 17)
    Player 0 now has 10 and Player 1 now has 17
    Player 1 takes the lead by 7
    """
    def say(score0, score1):
        return both(f(score0, score1), g(score0, score1))
    return say

三个都是commentary函数 就是带参的函数 返回不带参的函数本身

例如 say_score announce_lead函数可以在返回自身的情况下，打印一些文字

​ both函数在调用一次本身后 每次被调用 都可以返回函数本身 以达到函数传递的目的。

​

docs.title: 1.如果扔0个能够获胜 则扔0个
2.如果扔0个无法获胜 则继续讨论
如果在可以extraturn的情况下 优先触发extraturn
docs.text: ###     如果无法触发 则计算 0 1 2个的期望值 选择最优解？

docs.title: 人工智能在战争中的应用
docs.text:
ai战争实验室？？

美国ai研究所的首席官 亚历克斯卡普 介入俄乌战争

天空无人机系统等 分析卫星图像 处理数据 提供相应的军事政策

再比如 自主追踪等 都运用了计算机视觉

docs.title: ai目前的应用会加剧信息战的升级
人工智能在战争中带来的伦理挑战
docs.text:
1.责任归属困境

​ 如果ai误杀平民 或者 出现了决策失误 责任归结于谁 指挥官还是算法本身

2.没有相关法律约束ai的使用

3.ai本身的立场对决策的误判（就是算法透明性与偏见）（黑箱理论）
